back: You are no longer marked as away
notignored: %n is not on the ignore list
welcome: Welcome to Burd IRC! Good news! If you're reading this, then you're running the latest Burd IRC! If you need help using the client you can find a tutorial at burdirc.haxed.net/docs You can also contact someone for help in #burdirc on Libera.chat Now just select your perferred language below and click Go!
help_text:
Type /help <command> for command usage information. The following commands are available:
 %c

help.ABOUT: ABOUT, Gets information about the client
help.AWAY: AWAY [<reason>], sets you away (use /AWAY with a blank message to unset)
help.BAN: BAN <mask> [<mask>], bans everyone matching the mask from the current channel.
help.CTCP: CTCP <nick> <message>, send the CTCP message to nick, common messages are VERSION and USERINFO
help.CYCLE: CYCLE, Parts and re-joins the current channel
help.DEHOP: DEHOP <nick>, removes chanhalf-op status from the nick on the current channel
help.DEVOICE: DEVOICE <nick>, removes voice status from the nick on the current channel
help.ECHO: ECHO <message>, Prints the message in the current tab
help.HOP: HOP <nick>, gives chanhalf-op status to the nick
help.IGNORE: IGNORE <nick|mask>, Prevents given mask from sending you messages
help.INVITE: INVITE <nick> [<channel>], invites someone to a channel, by default the current channel
help.KICK: KICK <nick> [reason], kicks the nick from the current channel
help.KICKBAN: KICKBAN <nick> [reason], bans then kicks the nick from the current channel
help.ME: ME <action>, sends the action to the current channel (actions are written in the 3rd person, like /me jumps)
help.MODE: MODE <nick|channel> [<modes>], Gets or sets modes for a given target
help.MSG: MSG <nick> <message>, sends a private message to a given nick
help.NAMES: NAMES [channel], Lists the nicks on the channel
help.OP: OP <nick>, gives chanop status to the nick
help.PART: PART [<channel>] [<reason>], leaves the channel, by default the current one
help.QUERY: QUERY <nick> [message], opens up a new privmsg window to someone and optionally sends a message
help.QUIET: QUIET <mask> [<quiettype>], quiet everyone matching the mask in the current channel
help.QUOTE: QUOTE <text>, sends the text in raw form to the server
help.TOPIC: TOPIC <topic>, sets the topic in the current channel
help.UNQUIET: UNQUIET <mask> [<mask>...], unquiets the specified masks if supported by the server
help.USERHOST: USERHOST <nick>, Displays the mask for the given user

networks.no_server: You must enter a server address
networks.no_port: You must enter a server port

app_settings.show_nick_next_to_input: Show nick next to channel input
app_settings.display_moon: Display moon next to idle users
